props.text:
SELECT  [lodging].[Bed].[id] AS [bedId] 
	, [lodging].[Bed].[bedName] AS [Bed] 
	FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Bed] 
	WHERE  [lodging].[Bed].[timeRetired] IS NULL

onChange.script:
txaJsonQueryPreety = self.getSibling("txaJsonQueryPreety")
	if not(self.props.text):
		txaJsonQueryPreety.props.text = None
	else:
		import json
		
		pyObj = json.loads(self.props.text) 
		jsonObj = json.dumps(pyObj, indent=4) 
		txaJsonQueryPreety.props.text = jsonObj

config.script:
exampleSqlQuery = """SELECT  [lodging].[Bed].[id] AS [bedId] 
	, [lodging].[Bed].[bedName] AS [Bed] 
	FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Bed] 
	WHERE  [lodging].[Bed].[timeRetired] IS NULL 
	""" 
	
	root = self.parent
	txaQuery = self.getSibling("txaQuery")
	txaJsonQuery = self.getSibling("txaJsonQuery")
	if not(txaQuery.props.text):
		txaQuery.props.text = exampleSqlQuery
	
	query = txaQuery.props.text
	try:
		jsonQuery = root.prepQueryToJson(query)
	except:
		from traceback import format_exc
		txaJsonQuery.props.text = format_exc()
	txaJsonQuery.props.text = jsonQuery

root = self.parent
	txaJsonQuery = self.getSibling("txaJsonQuery")
	txaJsonWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlus")
	txaJsonQueryPreety = self.getSibling("txaJsonQueryPreety")
	txaQueryArgs = self.getSibling("txaQueryArgs")
	txaError = self.getSibling("txaError")
	tblA = self.getSibling("tblA")
	
	txaError.props.text = ''
	
	jsonQuery = txaJsonQuery.props.text 
	
	if jsonQuery is None:
		raise ValueError('JsonQuery is null!')
		
	jsonWherePlus = txaJsonWherePlus.props.text
	
	from jsonizer.convert import toPrepQuery

	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, top = 8, offset = 0, orderby = "[lodging].[Bed].[id]")
	txaQueryArgs.props.text = 'query , args:\n{} , {}'.format(query , args)
	
	try:
		
		tblA.props.data = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args, 'RITIOps')

	except:
		import sys
		from java.lang import Exception
		exceptionType, exception, stacktrace = sys.exc_info()
		if exceptionType == Exception:
			exception = exception.getCause()		
		
		from traceback import format_exc
		txaError.props.text += '\nFailed exec \n{} \n{}'.format(str(exception), format_exc())

root = self.parent
	txaQuery = self.getSibling("txaQuery")
	txaJsonQuery = self.getSibling("txaJsonQuery")
	txaJsonQueryPreety = self.getSibling("txaJsonQueryPreety")
	txaWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaWherePlus")
	txaJsonWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlus")
	txaJsonWherePlusPreety = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlusPreety")
	txaQueryArgs = self.getSibling("txaQueryArgs")
	txaError = self.getSibling("txaError")
	
	
	tblA = self.getSibling("tblA")
	txaQuery.props.text = None
	txaJsonQuery.props.text = None 
	txaJsonQueryPreety.props.text = None
	txaWherePlus.props.text = None
	txaJsonWherePlus.props.text = None
	txaJsonWherePlusPreety.props.text = None
	txaQueryArgs.props.text = None
	txaError.props.text = ''
	system.perspective.print( dir(txaQueryArgs))
	tblA.props.data = None
	
	#txaQueryArgs.__setattr__('text','xyz')

onChange.script:
txaPrep = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlusPreety")
	#txaPrep.props.text = 'x'
	if not(self.props.text):
		txaPrep.props.text = None
	else:	
		import json
		
		pyObj = json.loads(self.props.text) 
		system.perspective.print(('pyObj', pyObj))
		jsonObj = json.dumps(pyObj, indent=4) #, separators=(',', ': '))
		txaPrep.props.text = jsonObj

props.text:
query , args:
SELECT [lodging].[Bed].[id] AS [bedId], [lodging].[Bed].[bedName] AS [Bed] FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Bed]  WHERE ([lodging].[Bed].[timeRetired] IS NULL) AND ([lodging].[Bed].[roomId] = ?) ORDER BY [lodging].[Bed].[id] OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 8 ROWS ONLY , [45]

config.script:
root = self.parent
	txaJsonQuery = self.getSibling("txaJsonQuery")
	txaJsonWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlus")
	txaQueryArgs = self.getSibling("txaQueryArgs")

	jsonQuery = txaJsonQuery.props.text 
	
	if jsonQuery is None:
		raise ValueError('JsonQuery is null!')
		
	jsonWherePlus = txaJsonWherePlus.props.text
	
	from jsonizer.convert import toPrepQuery
	
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, top = 7, offset = 0, orderby = "[lodging].[Bed].[id]")
	txaQueryArgs.props.text = 'prepQuery :\n{} \nargs :\n{}'.format(query , args)
	txaQueryArgs.props.text += '\n{}'.format([type(x) for x in args])

props.text: (2) jsonQuery + jsonWherePlus + orderby + offset fetch ->  prepQuery, args

config.script:
root = self.parent
	txaWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaWherePlus")
	txaJsonWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlus")
	
	exampleSqlWherePlus = """[lodging].[Bed].[roomId] = 45"""
	
	if not(txaWherePlus.props.text):
		system.perspective.print((not(txaWherePlus.props.text), txaWherePlus.props.text))
		txaWherePlus.props.text = exampleSqlWherePlus
	
	system.perspective.print(('txaWherePlus.props.text:',txaWherePlus.props.text))
	
	try:
		txaJsonWherePlus.props.text = root.wherePlusToJsonWherePlus(txaWherePlus.props.text)
	except:
		from traceback import format_exc
		txaJsonWherePlus.props.text = format_exc()

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaQuery"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaJsonQuery"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaJsonQueryPreety"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaJsonWherePlusPreety"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaWherePlus"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaJsonWherePlus"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaQueryArgs"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

root = self.parent
	tblA = self.getSibling("tblA")
	tblA.props.data = None

root = self.parent
	txaJsonQuery = self.getSibling("txaJsonQuery")
	txaJsonWherePlus = self.getSibling("txaJsonWherePlus")
	txaJsonQueryPreety = self.getSibling("txaJsonQueryPreety")
	txaQueryArgs = self.getSibling("txaQueryArgs")
	txaError = self.getSibling("txaError")
	tblA = self.getSibling("tblA")
	
	txaError.props.text  = ''
	jsonQuery = txaJsonQuery.props.text 

	
	if jsonQuery is None:
		raise ValueError('JsonQuery is null!')
		
	jsonWherePlus = txaJsonWherePlus.props.text


	from jsonizer.convert import toPrepQuery
	
	testList = []
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus)
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, offset = 0,fetch = 2, orderby = "[dbo].[Orders].[CustomerID], [dbo].[Order Details].[Quantity] desc")
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, top = 5, offset = 0, orderby = "[dbo].[Orders].[CustomerID], [dbo].[Order Details].[Quantity] desc")
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, distinct = True, top = 5, offset = 0, orderby = "[dbo].[Orders].[CustomerID]")
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, isCountQuery = True, distinct = True, top = 5, offset = 0, orderby = "[dbo].[Orders].[CustomerID]")
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	query , args = toPrepQuery(jsonQuery, jsonWherePlus = jsonWherePlus, top = 5, offset = 0, orderby = "[dbo].[Orders].[CustomerID], [dbo].[Order Details].[Quantity] desc")
	testList.append(dict(query= query, args=args))
	txaQueryArgs.props.text = 'query , args:\n{} , {}'.format(query , args)
	#system.perspective.print(('q+args: ',query,args))
	
	
	i=0
	for test in testList:
		try:
			result = system.db.runPrepQuery(test['query'],test['args'], 'Northwind')
		except:
			import sys
			from java.lang import Exception
			exceptionType, exception, stacktrace = sys.exc_info()
			if exceptionType == Exception:
				exception = exception.getCause()		
			
			from traceback import format_exc
			txaError.props.text += '\nFailed test no {} \n{} \n{}'.format(i+1, str(exception), format_exc())  
		i += 1
		#tblA.props.data = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args, 'Northwind')

root = self.parent
	compName = "txaError"
	comp = self.getSibling(compName)
	comp.props.text = None

customMethods.name: queryToJson
customMethods.script:
query = query.replace("\n", " ")
	query = query.replace("\t", " ")
	
	def unquote(text):
		unquoted = text.strip()
		if len(unquoted) >= 2 and unquoted[0] == '[' and unquoted[-1] == ']':
			unquoted = unquoted[1:-1]
		return unquoted
			
	lowQuery = query.lower() 
	posSelect = query.lower().find('select ')
	#system.perspective.print(posSelect)
	
	qtyFrom = lowQuery.count(' from ')
	posFrom = lowQuery.find(' from ')
	
	
	qtyWhere = lowQuery.count(' where ')
	posWhere = lowQuery.find(' where ')
	
	qtyOrderBy = lowQuery.count(' order by ')
	posOrderBy = lowQuery.find(' order by ')
	
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format(qtyFrom, posFrom))
	
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format(qtyWhere, posWhere))
	
	fromClause = query[(posFrom + len(' from ')):posWhere]
	fromClause = fromClause.strip()
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('fromClause',fromClause))
	
	whereClause = query[(posWhere + len(' where ')):posOrderBy]
	whereClause = whereClause.strip()
	
	orderByClause = query[(posOrderBy + len(' order by ')):] if posOrderBy > 0 else ''
	orderByClause = orderByClause.strip()
	
	selectList = query[(posSelect + len('select ')):posFrom]
	selectList = selectList.split(',')
	selectList = [x.split(' AS ') for x in selectList]
	selectList
	select = []
	for item in selectList:
		itemAux = item
		dictAux = {}
		#if len(item) == 1:
			#item.append('')
			
		#item = [x.replace('[','') for x in item]
		#item = [x.replace(']','') for x in item]
		
		tabcol = item[0].split('.')
		dictAux['schema'] = unquote(tabcol[0].strip())
		dictAux['table'] = unquote(tabcol[1].strip())
		dictAux['column'] = unquote(tabcol[2].strip())
		
		system.perspective.print(item)
	
	#return
		
		dictAux['alias'] = unquote(item[1].strip()) if len(item) == 2 else ''
		select.append(dictAux)
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('select', select))
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('fromClause',fromClause))
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('whereClause',whereClause))
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('orderByClause', orderByClause))
	source = {}
	source['select'] = select
	source['from'] = fromClause 
	source['where'] = whereClause
	source['orderby'] = orderByClause
	
	return system.util.jsonEncode(source)

customMethods.name: prepQueryToJson
customMethods.script:
query = query.replace("\n", " ")
	query = query.replace("\t", " ")
	
	def unquote(text):
		unquoted = text.strip()
		if len(unquoted) >= 2 and unquoted[0] == '[' and unquoted[-1] == ']':
			unquoted = unquoted[1:-1]
		return unquoted
			
	lowQuery = query.lower() 
	posSelect = query.lower().find('select ')
	#system.perspective.print(posSelect)
	
	qtyFrom = lowQuery.count(' from ')
	posFrom = lowQuery.find(' from ')
	
	
	qtyWhere = lowQuery.count(' where ')
	posWhere = lowQuery.find(' where ')
	
	qtyOrderBy = lowQuery.count(' order by ')
	if qtyOrderBy > 0:
		raise ValueError('Remove ORDER BY clause!')

	
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format(qtyFrom, posFrom))
	
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format(qtyWhere, posWhere))
	
	fromClause = query[(posFrom + len(' from ')):posWhere]
	fromClause = fromClause.strip()
	system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('fromClause',fromClause))
	
	whereClause = query[(posWhere + len(' where ')):] 
	whereClause = whereClause.strip()
	
	
	selectList = query[(posSelect + len('select ')):posFrom]
	selectList = selectList.split(', ')
	selectList = [x.split(' AS ') for x in selectList]
	selectList
	select = []
	for item in selectList:
		if len(item) < 1:
			raise ValueError('Column name (full) is missing')

		dictAux = {}
		system.perspective.print(item)

		dictAux['column'] = item[0].strip() if len(item) >= 1 else ''
		dictAux['alias'] = unquote(item[1].strip()) if len(item) == 2 else ''
		select.append(dictAux)
		
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('select', select))
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('fromClause',fromClause))
	#system.perspective.print('{} {}'.format('whereClause',whereClause))

	source = {}
	source['select'] = select
	source['from'] = fromClause 
	source['where'] = whereClause
	
	return system.util.jsonEncode(source)

customMethods.name: wherePlusToJsonWherePlus
